speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is David. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: This is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I'm reaching out regarding your account with Green Bank.

speaker: Customer
text: Oh, I see. I was expecting a call. What's the status?

speaker: Agent
text: Before we proceed, I need to inform you that this call is about a debt collection matter. Can you provide your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Your current balance is $450. When do you plan to make a payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay it by the end of the week.

speaker: Agent
text: Sounds good! We accept online payments. Would you like assistance with that?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, please guide me through the process.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course! To start, visit our website and click on 'Make a Payment'.

speaker: Customer
text: Got it, I’ll do that right away.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your cooperation, David. If you have any questions, feel free to call back.
